title: Useless Husbands are those…

పనికిరాని వట్టి భర్తలంతె!! ![😁](https://static.xx.fbcdn.net/images/emoji.php/v9/ta8/1.5/16/1f601.png)![😂](https://static.xx.fbcdn.net/images/emoji.php/v9/t29/1.5/16/1f602.png)

 Instead of lording over her, when a woman is upset, those that console her, like servants, are the real lovers. The rest, are useless husbands!!
